column2: b'Slam Dunk: Hoero Basketman-damashii! Hanamichi to Rukawa no Atsuki Natsu'

b"Ichiro Mizusawa, a player from Rukawa's old junior high school, Tomigoaka, is diagnosed with a crippling leg condition and wants to play one last game with Rukawa. Hanamichi sets out to help the boy and fulfill his wish. \n\n(Source: ANN)"
